Package com.Akif

Class AbstractGraphADT<E>

java.lang.Object
com.Akif.AbstractGraphADT<E>
Type Parameters:
E - Vertices type in a graph.
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphADT<E>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdjacencyListMatrix
public abstract class AbstractGraphADT<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphADT<E>
Abstract base class for graphs. A graph is a set of vertices and a set of edges. Vertices are Generic Type E.
